response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, we are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,200,000. We are confident that this offer not only represents great value but also aligns with your expectations for such a high-quality product. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
